snippet.title: Ninja Dude vs Zombies Teaser
snippet.description:
Ninja Dude vs Zombies is an endless tap'n'slash arcade clicker game telling a story of a brave ninja who is trapped on a tower surrounded by hordes of bloody zombies. His only chance of surviving this zombie invasion is with the help of his thick-and-thin shurikens.

Available on the App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/ninja-dude-vs-zombies-endless/id1095681176?mt=8

Like Ninja on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ninjadudevszombies/
Follow Ninja on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AdoreGames
Visit official website: http://adoregames.com/games/ninja-dude-vs-zombies
